name: 여성 화이트 블라우스
summary: This elegant white blouse is perfect for a stylish and sophisticated look. Made with intricate lace details, it pairs beautifully with jeans or skirts. The blouse features a comfortable fit and a classic design, suitable for various occasions.

name: 기본 블랙 티셔츠
summary: This is a basic black short-sleeved t-shirt suitable for casual wear. It pairs well with a variety of outfits and is made from a comfortable, stretchy material. Ideal for everyday use and versatile enough for different occasions.

name: 도트 슬리브리스와 와이드 팬츠 세트
summary: This outfit features a chic, beige polka-dot sleeveless top paired with comfortable, wide-leg trousers. Perfect for a casual yet stylish look during warmer seasons. The light and breathable fabric ensures all-day comfort.

name: 청 롱 스커트
summary: A stylish blue denim long skirt with a simple cut, perfect for casual outings. The skirt features a comfortable fit, making it ideal for everyday wear. Pair it with sneakers for a relaxed look.

name: 긴팔 캐주얼 원피스
summary: Comfortable long-sleeve casual dress in brown. Made with soft material, perfect for everyday wear. Ideal for a relaxed and cozy look.

name: 라이트 블루 데님 반바지
summary: Comfortable light blue denim shorts designed with an elastic waistband and spacious pockets. Perfect for casual outings and warm weather. Pair it with your favorite top and sneakers for a relaxed look.

name: 여성용 루즈핏 니트 스웨터
summary: This is a stylish loose-fitting knit sweater designed for women. It features a dark gray color with delicate lace detail around the sleeves. The high-neck design adds an extra layer of warmth and elegance. Perfect for casual wear and can be paired with jeans or leggings for a chic look.

name: 민소매 블라우스
summary: This stylish sleeveless blouse is perfect for summer wear. It features a flowy design with a comfortable fit and a modern blue color. Ideal for casual outings or semi-formal occasions, it pairs well with a variety of bottoms.

name: 플로랄 롱 원피스
summary: This is a stylish long dress with a floral pattern, featuring long sleeves and a flowy skirt. It's perfect for casual outings and can be paired with heels or flats for a chic look.

name: 핑크 버튼 원피스
summary: This elegant pink dress features a V-neckline and short sleeves. It has a button-down front with a flared bottom, providing both comfort and style. It's perfect for casual outings and warm weather.

name: 블랙 레이스 칼라 원피스
summary: This elegant black dress features a delicate white lace collar, short sleeves, and a ruffled hem, offering a stylish and sophisticated look perfect for any occasion.

name: 클래식 블랙 트위드 세트
summary: This elegant set features a black tweed jacket with white cuffs and collar, paired with a matching black skirt. The jacket is accentuated by large buttons and the outfit exudes a classic, sophisticated style. Ideal for formal settings and chic events, it combines timeless design with modern touches. The matching handbag and accessories complete the refined look.

name: 스트라이프 패턴 셔츠
summary: This blue striped pattern shirt features a relaxed fit with a pleat detail at the back. The 3/4 sleeves and classic collar make it perfect for a casual yet stylish look.

name: 베이지 플리츠 헴드 드레스
summary: Elegant beige dress featuring pleated hem and flared sleeves. Perfect for formal or casual occasions, providing a chic and classy look.

name: 블랙 와이드 팬츠
summary: These black wide-leg pants are designed for comfort and style. Suitable for casual and semi-formal occasions, they offer a relaxed fit that pairs well with various tops. The pants are perfect for everyday wear, providing a chic and modern look.

name: 심플 블랙 티셔츠
summary: This casual black long-sleeved t-shirt offers a simple and timeless look. It's versatile and perfect for everyday wear. Made from comfortable material, it can be paired with a variety of outfits for an effortless style.

name: 넥 퍼 파카
summary: This stylish black parka features a luxurious fur trim around the collar, perfect for keeping warm in cold weather. The coat has a relaxed fit, with a drawstring waist for adjustable comfort and large front pockets for convenience. Pair it with jeans and sneakers for a chic, casual look.

name: 레드 미니 드레스
summary: A chic red mini dress featuring short sleeves and a stylish collar. Ideal for casual outings or semi-formal occasions. Pair with heels for a sophisticated look.

name: 데님 셔츠 원피스
summary: A stylish blue denim dress featuring long sleeves, a button-down front, and a belted waist. The front chest pockets and classic collar add a chic, casual touch. Perfect for a comfortable yet fashionable look.

name: 루즈핏 브라운 셔츠
summary: This loose-fit shirt features a stylish and comfortable brown design. It has a unique button detail and long sleeves with cinched cuffs. Perfect for a casual yet chic look.
